LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefender.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefender.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefender.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefender.label: Peacekeeper Defender
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefender.description: Standard Security variant of the Defender, mostly commonly found on starships to urban military installations. It features higher armour.
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefenderForest.label: Peacekeeper Defender Forest
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefenderForest.description: Forest variant of the Defender. It features higher melee skills and agility and has a movement bonus on forest terrain.
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefenderDesert.label: Peacekeeper Defender Desert
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefenderDesert.description: Desert variant of the Defender. It features higher rate of fire and has a movement bonus on desert terrain.
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefenderWinter.label: Peacekeeper Defender Winter
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperDefenderWinter.description: Winter variant of the Defender. It features higher accuracy and has a movement bonus on snowy terrain.
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperEnforcer.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperEnforcer.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperEnforcer.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperEnforcer.label: Peacekeeper Enforcer
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperEnforcer.description: Standard Security variant of the Enforcer, a common sight on war torn planets and are fielded by massive private and planetary armies. It features higher armour.
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperEnforcerForest.label: Peacekeeper Enforcer Forest
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperEnforcerForest.description: Forest variant of the Enforcer. It features higher melee skills and agility and has a movement bonus on forest terrain.
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperEnforcerDesert.label: Peacekeeper Enforcer Desert
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperEnforcerDesert.description: Desert variant of the Enforcer. It features higher rate of fire and has a movement bonus on desert terrain.
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperEnforcerWinter.label: Peacekeeper Enforcer Winter
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperEnforcerWinter.description: Winter variant of the Enforcer. It features higher accuracy and has a movement bonus on snowy terrain.
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperSentinel.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperSentinel.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperSentinel.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperSentinel.label: Peacekeeper Sentinel
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperSentinel.description: Standard Security variant of the Sentinel, they are often found in few numbers supporting the vast armies of Defenders and Enforcers in an ongoing conflict. It features higher armour.
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperSentinelForest.label: Peacekeeper Sentinel Forest
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperSentinelForest.description: Forest variant of the Sentinel. It features higher melee skills and agility and has a movement bonus on forest terrain.
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperSentinelDesert.label: Peacekeeper Sentinel Desert
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperSentinelDesert.description: Desert variant of the Sentinel. It features higher rate of fire and has a movement bonus on desert terrain.
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperSentinelWinter.label: Peacekeeper Sentinel Winter
LanguageData.RSPeacekeeperSentinelWinter.description: Winter variant of the Sentinel. It features higher accuracy and has a movement bonus on snowy terrain.
